summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3560, for the improvement of East 79th Street, from 10th Avenue Northeast to 8th Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 44039, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
